name: part_006
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠】さくらみこ1st Live ＂flower fantasista!＂【#咲き誇るみこち】 [mVmWmkHltak]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Intro story section with narration about Sakura Miko's origins.
Opening transition sequence featuring a countdown and a flashback clip.
Greeting section where Sakura Miko enters the stage and addresses the audience.

subtitles.original: むかしむかし、電脳世界から神様は...
subtitles.english: Once upon a time, from the cyber world, God...

subtitles.original: ...生まれたばかりの世界を豊かにするため、
subtitles.english: ...in order to enrich the newly born world,

subtitles.original: 神の使いを創造しました。
subtitles.english: He created a divine messenger.

subtitles.original: 名を、さくらみこ。
subtitles.english: Her name: Sakura Miko.

subtitles.original: 神様のお使いはそっちのけで、
subtitles.english: Putting her duties as a messenger aside,

subtitles.original: アイドルに出会い、あこがれました。
subtitles.english: She encountered idols and came to admire them.

subtitles.original: でもさいしょは、うまくはいきませんでした。
subtitles.english: But at first, things didn't go well.

subtitles.original: そこに、みこを支えようとみこぴーが集まってきました。
subtitles.english: Then, the Mikopi gathered to support Miko.

subtitles.original: それからたくさんの仲間に出会い、
subtitles.english: After that, she met many companions,

subtitles.original: 努力し、頑張り続け、
subtitles.english: Worked hard, persevered,

subtitles.original: そして、みこは...
subtitles.english: And then, Miko...

subtitles.original: そんな私の夢は...
subtitles.english: My dream is...

subtitles.original: アイドルになることです！
subtitles.english: ...to become an idol!

subtitles.original: にゃはろー！
subtitles.english: Nyahallo!

subtitles.original: みこのその一歩！
subtitles.english: This is Miko's first step!

subtitles.original: みんな、いくぞー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, let's go!

subtitles.original: ねぇ　思い出した歌
subtitles.english: Hey, a song I remembered

subtitles.original: そっと　涙した日は
subtitles.english: On days when I quietly shed tears

subtitles.original: さあ　数えてみようか
subtitles.english: Come on, shall we try counting

subtitles.original: これまで起こした奇跡を
subtitles.english: The miracles we've made so far

subtitles.original: ひとつ　止まらない足で
subtitles.english: One, with feet that won't stop

subtitles.original: ふたつ　超えていく夢も
subtitles.english: Two, even the dreams we go beyond

subtitles.original: みっつ　繋がる絆は
subtitles.english: Three, the bonds that connect us

subtitles.original: 君と広げてきたんだよ
subtitles.english: Are what I've spread with you

subtitles.original: 何度でも　咲き誇り
subtitles.english: Blooming proudly again and again

subtitles.original: 続いていく物語
subtitles.english: The story that continues

subtitles.original: まだ見たことのない　景色を探しに行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go find the scenery we haven't seen yet

subtitles.original: 花ひとつずつが　小さくてもほら
subtitles.english: Even if each flower is small, see

subtitles.original: 支え合えたら　桜になれるよ
subtitles.english: If we support each other, we can become cherry blossoms

subtitles.original: 僕らが繋いだ　大きな希望は
subtitles.english: The great hope that we connected

subtitles.original: これからも　春風になって　満ちていくのさ
subtitles.english: Will become the spring breeze and continue to fill the air

subtitles.original: ひとつ　涙こぼれたら
subtitles.english: One, if a tear falls

subtitles.original: ふたつ　両手を叩いて
subtitles.english: Two, clap your hands

subtitles.original: みっつ　数えて始めよう　君といれば大丈夫
subtitles.english: Count to three and let's begin, with you it's okay

subtitles.original: 弱音と本音で泣いたり
subtitles.english: Crying with complaints and true feelings

subtitles.original: 諦めかけたルートも
subtitles.english: Even the routes I almost gave up on

subtitles.original: 塗り替えて笑い合えた　ずっと強くなれたんだ
subtitles.english: We repainted and laughed together, I've become stronger

subtitles.original: 枝ひとつずつじゃ　心許なくても　ほら
subtitles.english: Even if each branch is precarious, see

subtitles.original: 支え合えたら　桜樹になれるよ
subtitles.english: If we support each other, we can become a cherry tree

subtitles.original: 手と手を合わせ　形は花びら
subtitles.english: Putting hand to hand, the shape is a petal

subtitles.original: この気持ち　言葉すら超えて　届けるのさ
subtitles.english: I'll deliver this feeling, even beyond words

subtitles.original: 冴えない私を　好きになってくれたこと
subtitles.english: The fact that you came to like someone like me

subtitles.original: これからも後悔なんて　させないから見ててね
subtitles.english: I won't let you regret it, so keep watching me

subtitles.original: 意地を張ってた　あの日よりも　強く大きくなったでしょ？
subtitles.english: I've grown stronger and bigger than that stubborn day, right?

subtitles.original: 次は君の　支えになりたいから
subtitles.english: Because next, I want to be your support

subtitles.original: 空に願う星　涙をあずけて
subtitles.english: Wishing on the stars in the sky, entrusting my tears

subtitles.original: そろそろ僕も　一歩踏み出すよ
subtitles.english: It's about time I too take a step forward

subtitles.original: 僕らが育てた　大きな希望は　ほら
subtitles.english: The great hope that we nurtured, see

subtitles.original: こんなにも　色とりどりのような　場所になったよ
subtitles.english: It has become such a vibrant and colorful place
